plot outline: The hunt for a highly intelligent and enigmatic professional killer leads to a novel named 'Nandanavanadol', within the pages of which lies the answer to his true identity. But what could be the mystery hidden between the lines of a novel revolving around a hockey match set in the 1970s?
title: Nandanavanadol
plot: The hunt for a highly intelligent and enigmatic professional killer leads to a novel named '_Nandanavanadol_ (qv)', within the pages of which lies the answer to his true identity. But what could be the mystery hidden between the lines of a novel revolving around a hockey match set in the 1970s?
